name: KimchiFacts
0:
”Alexa, launch Kimchi facts”
”Alexa, open Kimchi facts”
”Alexa, ask Kimchi facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kimchi facts
des:
Ask for Kimchi facts, and learn about Kimchi.

Kimchi Facts provides fun facts about Kimchi the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Kimchi facts" or "Alexa, open Kimchi facts" to get a fact.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
